name: The Last Light (MrNoupGames)
description:
You are in your bedroom, and a monster tell you that he wants to play a game with you. You accept and he explains to you the rules. If he catches you, you lose, but if you survive, you win. Every night the monster will have a new way of catching you.

Will you pass all the nights?

*Este juego está disponible en Español y en Inglés* *This game is avaliable in English and Spanish*
